attributes.additional_details:
Britain and America both share culture, heritage, and language. We are ultimately in a special relationship. To actually immigrate to both countries is considerably difficult.

 So I propose the British government to lobby the White House to intact special immigration privileges, so the citizens between the two countries if wanting to immigrate toward one of the two countries will have easier access towards Work-Visas, Study-Visas, and Permanent resident visas.
